properties.entry: SELECT SERV_NM, SERV_IMG FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBSERVICE ORDER BY SERV_CODE DESC) WHERE SERV_CATEGORY = 'CONTENTS' AND ROWNUM <=4
SELECT SERV_NM, SERV_IMG FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBSERVICE ORDER BY SERV_CODE DESC) WHERE SERV_CATEGORY = 'LIFE STYLE' AND ROWNUM <=4
SELECT SERV_NM, SERV_IMG FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBSERVICE ORDER BY SERV_CODE DESC) WHERE SERV_CATEGORY = 'NEWS LETTER' AND ROWNUM <=4
SELECT SERV_NM, SERV_IMG FROM (SELECT * FROM SUBSERVICE ORDER BY SERV_CODE DESC) WHERE SERV_CATEGORY = 'FOOD' AND ROWNUM <=4
SELECT SERV_NM, SERV_IMG, SERV_CATEGORY, SERV_CONTENT FROM SUBSERVICE WHERE SERV_NM = ?
SELECT ROUND(AVG(SERV_POINT),2), COUNT(*) MEM_NO FROM SUBSERVICE_RE JOIN SUBSERVICE ON (SERV_CODE = SERVICE_CODE) JOIN MEM_SUB USING(SERV_CODE) WHERE SERV_NM = ? AND STATUS_RE='Y'
SELECT SERV_CODE, SERV_NM, SERV_IMG, SERV_CATEGORY FROM SUBSERVICE WHERE SERV_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY SERV_CODE DESC
SELECT SERV_CODE, COUNT(*)MEM_NO FROM MEM_SUB JOIN SUBSERVICE USING (SERV_CODE) WHERE SERV_NM=? GROUP BY SERV_CODE
